title: Head First Java
subtitle: 'A Brain-Friendly Guide
author: Kathy Sierra, Bert Bates, Trisha Gee
description: Head First Java is a complete learning experience in Java and object-oriented programming.

title: OCA Java SE 8
subtitle: 1Z0-808 Exam Study Guide
author: Edward Finegan, Robert Liguori, Aldir José Coelho Corrêa da Silva, Daniel Antonio Callegari
description: Official Guide to the Oracle Certified Associate Java SE 8 Programmer I Entrance Exam.

title: Java®
subtitle: How to program
author: Paul Deitel, Harvey Deitel
description: Java: How to Program, 10th Edition, provides a clear, simple, engaging, and fun introduction to Java programming with an early emphasis on objects.

title: Clean Code
subtitle: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship
author: Robert C. Martin
description: Even bad code can function. But if code isn’t clean, it can bring a development organization to its knees.

title: The Phoenix Project
subtitle: A Novel about IT, DevOps, and Helping Your Business Win
author: Gene Kim, Kevin Behr, George Spafford
description: Every person involved in a failed IT project should be forced to read this book.
